Name: Cheat or Die
About the game: The final exams are here ! Unfortunately, you're not prepared enough. You'll need some serious cheating skills to get through this week unharmed... Cheat or Die is a small indie puzzle game where you have to help Mathilde cheat during her final exams. The game takes place at Hartmann School, a well-established but intimidating school controlled by a terrifying Supervisor . Multiple perks & bonus to choose from in order to cheat more effectively A list of 10 levels of increased level of challenge, with various classrooms and numbers of students Multiple character dialogues adding to the story around the finals week The Supervisors gets stronger and stronger the better your grades are... ...and who knows, you may find some friends along the way...
